description:
No right sized firewood around? No problem. Turning smaller logs into campfire fuel is easy with Fiskars’ 14in. Maul. With its solid 2.5lb head, this maul turns even the meekest swing into a log splitting thwack. The powerful head sits atop Fiskars ergonomic handle that absorbs more than twice the shock of a wood handle, greatly reducing fatigue during long chopping sessions.

  • Flared cheeks and hammer head greatly increase mechanical advantage, making splitting large rounds easier than with a standard hatchet
  • Tempered and forged steel holds an edge for a long time
  • Hammer side makes short work of driving wedges or pounding stakes
  • Riveted head is designed for years of hard use
  • Fibreglass-reinforced polymer shaft is moulded around the head
  • IsoCore® handle technology absorbs 2x the vibration of a wooden handle and keeps the weight down
  • Ergonomic handle design with rubber overmold provides a sure grip
  • Mask style sheath protects the edge while leaving the hammer head clear for use
  • Fiskars recommends this axe for splitting small sized logs
name: Fiskars Maul 14" 2.5lb
